title: Unionist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Choose a target to protest with, and a target to protest against, during the night. 1 use.
-Choose a target to parade with. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If the target you protested with is lynched the following day, they are not lynched and the target you protested against Is lynched instead.
-When you parade with someone, you will learn their night notifications, and they will learn your role.

desc:
Post 1699
*My friend here is an expert on russian geography. If you cant trust them, who CAN you trust?*
